Key Match Events: KL Rahul departed for 9 from 14 deliveries in Perth vs South Africa
Pre-Game Insights: Rahul's place in the T20I side has been questioned
Post-Match Reflections: The India team management was asked on the eve of the match against South Africa in Perth whether they were thinking of replacing KL Rahul with Rishabh Pant, who has been warming the benches
Miscellaneous Highlights: India chose to bat first against South Africa on a pace-rich Perth pitch
Others: KL Rahul struggled to rotate the strike or keep going at a good click
Rahul was unable to control the bounce and edged one to the slip cordon
